sentence: Advertisement In the contest for the GOP nomination, Oz has several rivals: Kathy Barnette, a conservative commentator; Jeff Bartos, a real estate developer who ran unsuccessfully for lieutenant governor; Dave McCormick, a former hedge fund CEO; and Carla Sands, Donald Trump’s ambassador to Denmark.
author: Liz Skalka
title: Inside Dr. Oz's Campaign Road Show

sentence: Oz is in a crowded GOP race that also includes top rivals such as Dave McCormick, a former hedge fund executive, West Point graduate and Gulf War combat veteran who served as a Treasury Department official in former President George W. Bush's administration; Jeff Bartos, a real estate developer, philanthropist and the 2018 Republican nominee for lieutenant governor; and Carla Sands, a real estate executive and major Republican donor who served as ambassador to Denmark under former President Donald Trump.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Dr. Oz says his celebrity 'a huge advantage' as he runs for Senate; says he's 'aligned' with GOP voters

sentence: The state’s GOP primary is one of the most hotly contested and most-watched of the cycle, as Oz faces off against a crowded field of Republicans, including former hedge fund CEO and veteran Dave McCormick.
author: Brooke Singman
title: Dr. Oz says COVID-19 'steeled' him to run for office, calls on Fauci to resign

sentence: "The bigoted attacks my opponent Dave McCormick has made against me as the child of immigrants are reminiscent of slurs made in the past about Catholics and Jews," Oz said.
author: Alex Rogers and Michael Warren
title: Dr. Oz vows to renounce Turkish citizenship if elected to Senate

sentence: And my failing RINO opponent Dave McCormick is lying about me leaving the race after being exposed by Philly Inquirer.https://t.co/L0DgP6WMGC — Dr. Mehmet Oz (@DrOz) March 16, 2022 Oz’s linked a Philadelphia Inquirer article that claimed some of the donors helping McCormick to attack him are past donors of liberal Democrats, including Hillary Clinton’s 2016 presidential campaign.
author: Dillon Burroughs
title: ‘I’m In To Win’: Dr. Oz Responds To Report Of TV Show Talks

author: Jon Delano
title: David McCormick reacts to Trump's endorsement of Mehmet Oz and denies shipping jobs to China
